8(a) Initial Application

Â« Back to application overview

Manage Contributors

Follow the steps below to complete all information about people involved in your business.

  • Entity-owned firms do not need to complete step 1, prove ownership by people claiming disadvantage.

    Your firm's officers, directors, and member representatives must complete step 2. It contains the equivalent of former SBA forms 1010-IND and 912. There are some questions that do not have to be answered. Refer to the supplemental instructions for entity-owned firms for more information on how to answer these questions.

1. Prove ownership by people claiming disadvantage

If you do not own at least 51% of your business, other owners claiming disadvantage must fill out this section to prove 51% ownership by people claiming disadvantage.

Invite other owners

Your spouse, and the spouses of all owners claiming disadvantage, must complete this section.

Invite spouses

2. You must have others involved with your firm give their information

All of the following must fill out this section:

  • Everyone who owns at least 10% of your firm
  • Officers
  • Directors
  • Board members
  • Managers
  • Partners

Invite other contributors
